attributes.action: make nurses in the NHS wear rubber nurse outfits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make nurses wear rubber or PVC nurse outfits. 

In these times of austerity and with the ever constant fear of MRSA and other superbugs this would be of great benefit since dirt and unwanted fluids could be quickly wiped off and the smooth surfaces would be less likely to ahrbour bacteria etc.

There would also be great financial benefits to the NHS due to reduced laundry costs.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
